content: I'm going to do a chat.zulip.org deployment soon so that folks can play with it, but today I merged a bunch of changes designed to clean up both the visuals and CSS of "Manage streams" to match how our settings look, rather than having a parallel set of visuals with a parallel CSS implementation that used a different approach to indentation, aligning checkboxes with their labels, etc. See #20333 for a reference, though note the last screenshots there are a bit out of date (and there's a couple issues noted in the last comment on the PR).
